parameters.query: SELECT COALESCE(MAX(bug_id), 0) AS max_checked_bug_id FROM mantis.new_bug_monitor_log;

SELECT
  b.id AS bug_id,
  p.name AS project_name,
  FROM_UNIXTIME(b.date_submitted) AS registered_at,
  CASE b.status
    WHEN 10 THEN 'new'
    WHEN 20 THEN 'feedback'
    WHEN 30 THEN 'acknowledged'
    WHEN 40 THEN 'confirmed'
    WHEN 50 THEN 'assigned'
    WHEN 77 THEN 'èª¿æŸ»ä¸­'
    WHEN 78 THEN 'ä¿®æ­£ä¸­'
    WHEN 80 THEN 'resolved'
    WHEN 85 THEN 'ç¢ºèªæ¸ˆ'
    WHEN 90 THEN 'closed'
    ELSE CAST(b.status AS CHAR)
  END AS status_name,
  b.summary,
  bt.description AS detail_description,
  c.name AS category_name
FROM mantis_bug_table b
LEFT JOIN mantis_project_table p ON p.id = b.project_id
LEFT JOIN mantis_bug_text_table bt ON bt.id = b.bug_text_id
LEFT JOIN mantis_category_table c ON c.id = b.category_id
WHERE b.status = 10
  AND b.id > {{ $json.max_checked_bug_id || 0 }}
  AND FROM_UNIXTIME(b.date_submitted) >= '2025-10-01 00:00:00'
ORDER BY b.id
LIMIT 50;
